tool_description: Check your accounts with user, pass and shard
name: Valorant Checker  API
title: Valorant Checker  API

api_list.name: Get Shards
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://valorant-checker-api1.p.rapidapi.com/get_shards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "valorant-checker-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://valorant-checker-api1.p.rapidapi.com/get_shards"
